institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 15 (Change in Business Plan)
contents: Article 15 (Change in Business Plan) ① The applicant company must report any changes to the head of the affiliated organization in the following cases: 1. Change in the name, representative, business address, etc. of the applicant company, 2. Learning leader, dedicated Change in bank account, 3. Change in support type, 4. Other major changes related to budget amount, ② The head of the affiliated organization shall notify the relevant company of whether the change is approved for items 3 and 4 of Paragraph 1 and report the matter to the chairman of the board. shall.
